advancement.extrabotany.armorset_maid.de: Equip Pleiades Combat Maid Armor Set
advancement.extrabotany.ego_defeat.title: KiLLER LADY
advancement.extrabotany.root.desc: Don't have a good day, have a great day
advancement.extrabotany.root.title: Welcome to the World
advancement.extrabotany.sages_mana_ring_: Fill it to WIN the game
advancement.extrabotany.tinkle_use.title: Project Diva Desu
advancement.item_disabled.desc: You can' use it until you complete corresponding advancement <%s>.
block.extrabotany.edelweiss.reference: Do you want to build a snowman?
block.extrabotany.floating_edelweiss.ref: Do you want to build a snowman?
block.extrabotany.floating_gemini_orchid: Why is a raven like a writing desk?
block.extrabotany.floating_moon_bless.re: May you find all you have lost
block.extrabotany.floating_sun_bless.ref: May the light heal and enlighten you
block.extrabotany.gemini_orchid.referenc: Why is a raven like a writing desk?
block.extrabotany.moon_bless.reference: May you find all you have lost
block.extrabotany.sun_bless.reference: May the light heal and enlighten you
extrabotany.armorset.goblins_layer.name: Goblin Slayer
extrabotany.armorset.maid.name: Pleiades Combat Maid
extrabotany.armorset.miku.name: Starry Idol
extrabotany.armorset.shadow_warrior.desc: This night is so frightful and boundless. That my eyes come down with gloomy darkness.
But just by them both. I am seeking my rosiness.
extrabotany.armorset.shadow_warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
extrabotany.page.advanced_material0: Combine two forms of material into one with the catalyst of $(item)Spirit Fragment$(0), those material has greater power and proficiency.
extrabotany.page.aerialite0: Infuse the power of the sky and mana into $(item)Dragonstone$(0), and then it forms into $(item)Aerialite$(0), a magical alloy. Its property is as great as $(item)Terrasteel$(0).
extrabotany.page.aerialite2: Armor made by Aerialite provides considerable protection. With a set of armors, player grants higher motility, greater attack and life stealing ability. Also the speed of drawing bows is boosted. However, it greatly nerfs player's regeneration ability.
extrabotany.page.annoying_flower0: The Annoying Flower can fish in nearby Petal Apothecary filled with water. For that process it will use mana. Feeding Fried Chicken Legs to it will significantly increase the efficiency and the chance of getting treasure.
extrabotany.page.annoying_flower2: Cooked Chicken can be fried by soaking it in $(thing)Mana$(0). Fried Chicken Legs restore more hunger and give saturation.
extrabotany.page.annoying_flower3: Neither an angel or a devil.
extrabotany.page.bell_flower0: When placed in the open, the Bell Flower creates $(thing)Mana$(0) from wind. The higher it is, the more mana it produces. A Livingrock Pedestal nearby with a Nature Orb in it can increase its mana generation efficiency. Since it is a passive flower, it will decay.
extrabotany.page.bell_flower1: Only the storms can knock down the trees.
extrabotany.page.brew0: Hold an Empty Mana Glass Bottle and right-click a Mana Pool with enough mana, and you will acquire a tasty drink.
extrabotany.page.brew2: By crafting any flask potion with a Mana Cocktail , you can make a Special-made Cocktail that can be drinked two more times than the original flask and it has a longer effect.
extrabotany.page.brew3:
When a Special-made Cocktail is crafted with Popped Chorus Fruit. You make a Holy Grenade! The Holy Grenade will deal massive damage after exploding, giving bad effects to other creatures and giving the good effects to players.
A perfect item, but why is it a grenade?
extrabotany.page.brew4: Greatly improve the efficiency of mining, but overdraft your luck.
extrabotany.page.brew5: High level of resistance, but slow as turtle.
extrabotany.page.brew6: Gain super strength, but what's the cost?
extrabotany.page.brew7: Almost all positive effects! But wouldn't last long.
extrabotany.page.brew8: One can make you floating, may be better if used on enemies?
extrabotany.page.buddhist_relics0: $(item)Origin Creation - The Omniscience$(0) relic can simulate some of the Relics by pressing ctrl to switch its form. Keeping other forms will cost $(thing)Mana$(0). With insufficient mana it will change to its original form.
extrabotany.page.camera0: $(item)Shameimaru's Camera$(0) strips nearby creatures of their abilities. Projectiles in sight will vanish. Creatures affected by this will return to normal after a period of time. The camera can affect boss for a very short period instead.
extrabotany.page.core_god0: A upgrade to the Flügel tiara, the $(item)Core of Herrscher$(0) alows infinite flight at the cost of $(thing)Mana$(0). The Core of Herrscher also gives a slight strength boost and provides faster flight than the tiara
extrabotany.page.death_ring0: The $(item)Death Ring$(0) applies the Wither and Unluck effect on creatures looked at by the wearer at the cost of some $(thing)Mana$(0).
extrabotany.page.death_ring1: Do not fear power... fear those who wield it!
extrabotany.page.dimension_catalyst0: $(item)Dimension Catalyst$(0) connects the Overworld with other two dimensions. You can use $(thing)Mana$(0) to transform resources from overworld to those from other dimensions.
extrabotany.page.edelweiss0: $(item)Edelweiss$(0) will swallow the snow golem to produce mana. The mana production is done instantly, but there are still intervals.
extrabotany.page.edelweiss1: If you are reading this, you can read.
extrabotany.page.ego0: 200,000 Natural breath from a Nature Orb or an Invitation Letter can be used to summon an even more powerful Gaia Guardian. Its great powers and new abilties should be feared. New rules should be obeyed. Equipped armor and weapons have to be from Vanilla Minecraft or Botania or ExtraBotany(except if its changed in the config). Any others will be disarmed and dropped on the ground.
extrabotany.page.ego1: Challengers can not outnumber the number when it is summoned, or Ego will vanish. Ego is proficient in every type of weapon. In Stage One, Ego will use $(item)True Terra Blade$(0) or $(item)True Shadow Katana$(0). When entering Stage Two, Ego will be invulnerable for a period of time and meanwhile keep summoning landmines. Different colors means different effects.
extrabotany.page.ego4: Ego could use $(item)Influx Waver$(0) and $(item)Star Wrath$(0) in Stage Two. After its health reaches a threshold, Stage Three begins. Ego starts to be invulnerable again, meanwhile it keeps recovering and summons a wave of minions. Four minions use four different weapons. Defeating all minions in advance could terminate Ego's invulnerability.
extrabotany.page.ego5: Ego only use $(item)First Fractal$(0) in Stage Three, and all its abilities maximize. Challengers could be awarded with $(item)Pandora's Box$(0) after defeating Ego, with a $(item)Medal for Heroism$(0) inside it.
extrabotany.page.element_stone0: Element Stone made by corresponding element rune, it provides different amplifications. $(item)Aero Stone$(0) amplify movement, $(item)Earth Stone$(0) provides armor protection, $(item)Aqua Stone$(0) provides mana discount and $(item)Ignis Stone$(0) amplify damage.
extrabotany.page.excaliber0: $(item)Excaliber$(0) could shoot golden mana beam that will automatically trace enemies in a large area.
extrabotany.page.failnaught0: The $(item)Failnaught$(0) uses $(thing)Mana$(0) to shoot magic arrows which pierce through enemies and deal damage to the creatures in the area. The longer you draw the bow, the more damage it will deal.
extrabotany.page.failnaught1: A hundred shots, a hundred bullseyes.
extrabotany.page.first_fractal0: The sword that combines the power of all types of swords. Its name is First Fractal. All its attack will summon large numbers of sword projection. Where you are looking at, where it will reach.
extrabotany.page.frost_star0: The $(item)Frost Star$(0) freezes large areas of water and lava. It also applies slowness creatures looked at by the wearer.
extrabotany.page.frost_star1: I am the frozen heart of the Scourge!
extrabotany.page.gemini_orchid0: A $(item)Gemini Orchid$(0) is like a thermoelectric generator. If you place a block of lava in one of eight blocks nearby, and then place a block of water in another position, it will begin to produce mana. The higher the gap between two blocks' temperatures, the quicker mana will be generated. Since it is a passive flower, it will decay.
extrabotany.page.gilded_potato0: The Gilded Potato may have other uses. It might be useful in the future.
extrabotany.page.gilded_potato1: There is a miracle, something magical.
extrabotany.page.gilded_potato2: A mashed potato made from gilded potato. It could be delicious.
extrabotany.page.gold_cloth0: $(item)Das Rheingold$(0) can empty the binding of a relic, just crafting the relic with it.
extrabotany.page.gold_cloth2: An improved version of Terrasteel Armor. The wearer will gain the ability of regeneration while wearing a full set of it. It will also clear negative effects and give the wearer super powers when empty-handed.
extrabotany.page.header0: Welcome to the World of the supreme principle of Mana! You are the one who has great potential and I believe you will have a shiny, bright future. I am sure you are hunger for more knowledge. Follow me, I will pass on my knowledge and experience to you.
extrabotany.page.header1: The more progress you have done, the more knowledge you will have. I could give you one hint, you could obtain Spirit Fuel by eating Nightmare Fuel.
extrabotany.page.infinite_wine0:
Infinite Wine, that you can drink almost infinitly, it only costs mana to refill. To make one, you just need to combine a Special-made Cocktail with heroes medal.You can change the effects by crafting with other varieties of Special-made Cocktail.
Be carefull though, if you drink it all before it can refill, you will lose your relic and get a empty mana glass back, and you can only Restore 3 uses per minecraft day.
extrabotany.page.influx_waver0: An upgrade to $(item)Thunder Sword$(0). Its projectile will constantly attack the first entity it contacts.
extrabotany.page.jingwei_feather0: Equipped with $(item)Feather of Jingwei$(0), every empty-handed punch will shoot a fire ball which could recover you 1 absorption and stack to 10 at max.
extrabotany.page.lens0: $(item)Mana Lens: Mana$(0) is like a Mana Pool, it will infuse the item with mana. If you place a Alchemy Catalyst or a Conjuration Catalyst under the spreader, it will do the cocorresponding work.
extrabotany.page.lens2: $(item)Mana Lens: Push$(0) will enable Mana Burst to force the entities it collide to move with it.
extrabotany.page.lens4: $(item)Mana Lens: Trace$(0) will enable Mana Burst to locate the first entity within 3 meters and keep tracking until either is dead.
extrabotany.page.lens6: $(item)Mana Lens: Smelt$(0) is like a furnace, it will enable Mana Burst to smelt the block ti collide.
extrabotany.page.lens8: $(item)Mana Lens: Potion$(0) will add potion effects to the first entity collided. Craft the lens with the brew flask to decide its effect.
extrabotany.page.mana_buffer0: The Mana Buffer can store as much $(thing)Mana$(0) as 64 Mana Pools. It will drain $(thing)Mana$(0) from adjacent mana pools or mana buffer and supply it to a Mana Pool or Mana Buffer placed on top of it.
extrabotany.page.mana_drive_ring0: After equipping $(item)Ring of Mana Drive$(0), your mana will spread into air, supplying the functional flowers nearby.
extrabotany.page.miku0: An improved version of Manasteel Armor,it gives the wearer a high mana discount.
extrabotany.page.moon_bless0: Like the $(item)Nightshade$(0) the Moonlight Lily generates $(thing)Mana$(0) at night, but it is slightly more efficient. Please note that it will still decay.
extrabotany.page.moon_pendant0: $(item)Heart of Corrupted Moon$(0) combines all the effects of its crafting materials.
extrabotany.page.motor0: While riding Armored Motor, you could press space to speed up at the cost of tectonic energy, press ctrl to strike nearby enemies. While equipping accessory version, you could press R to summon.
extrabotany.page.nature_orb0: The $(item)Nature Orb$(0) can store Natural Breath, a magical power which protects the carrier. Blessing of Mana will provide you with mana, Blessing of Regeneration will speed up your regeneration and Blessing of Senro will drive away bad effects on you. To collect Natural Breath it needs to be placed in Power Frame and a ritualistic multiblock structure around Power Frame is needed.
extrabotany.page.nature_orb3: Second order multi-block, The mana pool containing mana in the structure can provide additional charging speed
extrabotany.page.nightmare_fuel0: $(item)Nightmare Fuel$(0) is the aggregation of the nightmare, you will suffer after eating it, but it may be the beginning of a sweet dream.
extrabotany.page.omni_violet0: According to a saying, knowledge is power. The $(item)Omniviolet$(0) converts Books or Written Books into $(thing)Mana$(0). To increase the amount of mana generated, Bookshelves can be placed around the Omniviolet in a similar fashion to an Enchantment Table.
extrabotany.page.peace_amulet0: $(item)Peace Amulet$(0) could guarantee that all weapons in ExtraBotany will no longer deal damage to other players and friendly mobs.
extrabotany.page.photonium0: Photonium is the opposite side of Shadowium. It combines the power of Spirit Fuel and Elementium.
extrabotany.page.photonium1: Three for one, Ten for three.
extrabotany.page.photonium3: It can be used to make $(item)Goblin Slayer Armor$(0), which powers player during day time, enabling him to regenerate more quickly.
extrabotany.page.potato_chips0: $(item)Potato Chips$(0) functions almost the same as Totem of Undying. When you are taking deadly damage, it will trigger, consume mana to recover you. It has 30s cool down but extended to 10min if the damage is from Boss.
extrabotany.page.power_frame0:
Place a mana item in the Power Frame, and the Power Frame will extract mana from the mana pool above and transfer to the mana item.
The Manatide Bellows bellows around the Mana Pool can accelerate its charging.
extrabotany.page.power_glove0: $(item)Power Glove$(0) allows you to auto leftclick at maximum attack speed if you keep pressing your mouse. It also slightly increase your attack speed.
extrabotany.page.reikar_lily0: The $(item)Reikar Lily$(0) turns the tremendous energy of lightning into $(thing)Mana$(0). When a lightning bolt hits nearby, it will generate a great amount of $(thing)Mana$(0) immediately and continue to produce $(thing)Mana$(0) for a long time. Reikar Lily itself could attract thunder.
extrabotany.page.rod_of_discord0: $(item)Rod of Discord$(0) could teleport you to where you are aiming at with nausea effect. If you try to use it when it is cooling down, you will receive damage.
extrabotany.page.sages_mana_ring0: The $(item)Sages Mana Ring$(0) can store nearly a infinite amount of $(thing)Mana$(0).
extrabotany.page.serenitian0: $(item)Serenitian$(0) could prevent passive flowers nearby at the same floor from fading away, and set the fading progress to zero.
extrabotany.page.shadowium0: With the magic of Gilded Mashed Potato, we can use Nightmare Fuel and a Elementium Ingot to make Shadowium. It's a very special kind of material and it performs better than Elementium.
extrabotany.page.shadowium3: With the power of Shadowium, $(item)Shadow Warrior Armor$(0) will give wearer speed, strength, and night vision when the night comes. A sword made of it also seems to call upon Shadow pixies.
extrabotany.page.silver_bullet0: An upgrade to $(item)Mana Blaster$(0). $(item)Silver Bullet$(0) shoots more powerful mana bursts. If you are wearing a set of Shooting Guardian, Silver Bullet no longer require Mana.
extrabotany.page.spirit_fuel0: $(item)Spirit Fuel$(0) is an important material which could be obtained by two ways. The first way is to eat $(item)Nightmare Fuel$(0). The second is to put it in the living stone altar to dry for 5 minutes. Spirit Fuel can be refined into $(item)Spirit Fragment$(0) through $(item)Livingrock Pedestal$(0).
extrabotany.page.star_wrath0: An upgrade to $(item)Star Caller$(0). It summons much more meteors than original version.
extrabotany.page.sun_bless0: Like the &1Dayblooms$(0) the Sunshine Lily produces $(thing)Mana$(0) from sunlight, but it is slightly more efficient. Please note that it will still decay.
extrabotany.page.sun_ring0: $(item)Ring of Sacred Sun$(0) combines all the effects of its crafting materials.
extrabotany.page.tinkle_flower0: The $(item)Tinkle flower converts kinetic energy of nearby moving players into $(thing)Mana$(0). It will also increase players' energy consumption.
extrabotany.page.tinkle_flower1: Ding dong, here I come to find you.
extrabotany.page.true_shadow_katana0: An upgrade to $(item)Shadow Katana$(0). It could summon three projection that automatically trace enemies.
extrabotany.page.true_terra_blade0: An upgrade to $(item)Terra Blade$(0). Its projectile will pierce through enemies.
extrabotanymisc.description: You can not use it until you complete corresponding advancement <%s>.
extrabotanymisc.inventoryUnfeasible: You have something that isn't allowed in this boss fight. Check your inventory and tips in the lexicon again!
extrabotanymisc.unlegalPlayercount: There are more people than there were when the boss is summoned. That's illegal!
